io.druid.indexing.overlord.scaling

Class ResourceManagementScheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.druid.indexing.overlord.scaling.ResourceManagementScheduler
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    NoopResourceManagementScheduler

    public class ResourceManagementScheduler
extends Object
    The ResourceManagementScheduler schedules a check for when worker nodes should potentially be created or destroyed. It uses a TaskRunner to return all pending tasks in the system and the status of the worker nodes in the system. The ResourceManagementScheduler does not contain the logic to decide whether provision or termination should actually occur. That decision is made in the ResourceManagementStrategy.
